creator: joelnn@gmail.com
text:
I am writing my own ajp13 server implementation, and I thought I ran into an
issue with mod_proxy_ajp, but according to:

http://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=39528

the mod_proxy_ajp documentation at
http://httpd.apache.org/docs/2.2/mod/mod_proxy_ajp.html is slightly wrong. The
section that reads:

AJP13_SEND_BODY_CHUNK :=
  prefix_code   3
  chunk_length  (integer)
  chunk        *(byte)

should be modified to read:

AJP13_SEND_BODY_CHUNK :=
  prefix_code   3
  chunk_length  (integer)
  chunk        *(byte)
  chunk_terminator (byte) Ox00

creator: tony@pc-tony.com
text:
Joel,

Patch added to:

Trunk :  http://svn.apache.org/viewvc?view=rev&rev=562077
2.2 Docs: http://svn.apache.org/viewvc?view=rev&rev=562078


Thanks for the fix.

Cheers,
Tony
